subject: Dear Ann.
body:
Dear Ann.

Thank you for responding to my ealy message regarding your transaction.

To answer your question on the possibility of securing a high court
perpetual injunction, well it's a court standing order to compel government
agencies or officials to follow rules and regulation.

The court perpetual injunction, will  be obtained from a district court and
it's a court standing order that MUST be obeyed by all parties involved
because nobody is above the law.

And what I mean by corruption has eaten deep into the system is that most
government agencies and officials are corrupt and dishonest and they take
advantage of innocent people for their selfish interest.

And also note that court perpetual injunction is also known as permanent
court order and immediately we obtain it from the district court, then all
government agencies, officials and paying banks will be compelled by LAW to
deduct all officials transfer fees, clearance charges and taxes from the
principal amount before transferring your funds to your bank account.

I look forward to finalizing this transaction soon.
Regards.
Mr. Roland.
